headline: Infinite growth is by definition, not sustainable

markdown.content:
I think both Cohost and Discord is sustainable. Yes, Discord has been shitting itself recently, but their business model is kinda like Cohost, free, no ads (and therefore no advertisers), and as long as Discord doesn't plan to IPO or want to be aqquired by a bigger company, I think Discord is going to survive
Reddit? Talk to me when reddit CEO lower his self arrogant
Twitter? Talk to me when Elon musk realize the real customers are the users AND the advertisers (like seriously ditching your users is already bad enough, also ditching your advertisers???)
